name: Verify 'ASC' sorting by 'PRICE' criteria
fullName: Verify search functionality: Verify 'ASC' sorting by 'PRICE' criteria

steps.name: Given  user navigates to home page
And  he is on home page
When  he search for a product with name 'pants'
Then  he should see the title 'Search results for: \'pants\''
And  he should see the amount 'Items 1-12 of 13'
When  he is sorting the grid 'ASC' by 'PRICE'
Then  he should see the grid sorted 'ASC' by 'PRICE'
